If a young man dreams that he utters the shahada after the accident, this may indicate consolation for the dreamer, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. Seeing him pronouncing the shahada can indicate goodness. And happiness, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about a car colliding with a wall in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a car colliding with a wall in a dream. We did not find clear concepts for seeing this. However, seeing a car accident in a dream could be a sign of disagreements, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. When an unmarried girl sees a car accident, this can indicate rivalries and conflicts, and God knows the unseen. In the event that a married man witnesses a car accident, it may lead to Trouble, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about saving a child from a car accident in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about saving a child from a car accident in a dream may indicate someone who will help him solve problems, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a married man sees saving a child, he can turn to someone who will help him solve financial crises, and God knows the unseen. Seeing a young man. title: Interpretation of a big fish in a dream Seeing a big fish in a dream

preview.html: A dream about a big fish shows a great source of livelihood, wealth, and other interpretations, and we will explain this to single, married, pregnant, and divorced people, such as buying a big fish, a big live fish, or a huge raw fish by Ibn Sirin and more on the topic: Interpretation of a dream about a big fish A big fish in a dream indicates Abundance of livelihood, wealth and wealth. It can indicate a high social status, a promotion in a job, or marriage for a girl or a young man, and for a pregnant woman, it indicates the birth of a child. Dream interpreters agreed that the interpretation of a dream about a large live fish means a lot of money, ample living and good status, or It can also be interpreted as success for goals that were difficult to achieve. Catching a big fish in a dream is evidence of benefit and goodness, and whoever catches a small fish in a dream indicates pleasure and benefit for him, and soft fish in a dream is good. Whoever dreams that he is looking at a large fish at the bottom Water, river, or pond, and he fishes and eats as he pleases, this indicates that he will suffer money, kindness, and livelihood. Seeing himself catching a very large fish, and not seeing a larger fish, indicates a wife from a very rich woman. Seeing a large, soft fish is sustenance and spoilsatOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Anyone who sees that he is trying to catch a big fish or a whale and does not catch it after a fight, this indicates an intense competition for money or the right. If she sees a big fish and is impressed With its beauty and shape, and the fish was raw and it was on the beach or someone gave it to her, then this is her future husband, and the fish was raised and collected and has a generous dignity. If the size of the fish in the dream is large but not hard, then this indicates the complexity and slowness of the dreamer’s affairs, in addition to slowing down some Tasks related to his life. The softness of the fish in the dream is the best evidence of the dreamer’s desire to share with others, and whenever the fish is long and without scales, this indicates false actions, because the fish that has no scales slips from his hand. If the dreamer sees a dead fish in the sea, this is evidence of something he aspires to. To him, but he will not achieve it. The dream of fish is associated with good luck for whoever sees it. If you see a fish swimming in front of you in the sea, river or lake and its colors are different and varied, this symbolizes the spiritual or social transformation that you will experience during this period and you will have a feeling of happiness and inner peace. If you see that you are fishing and catching a fish or a number of fish, this symbolizes that you will be lucky in work, study, or any project you are currently doing. If you take a pearl from the fish in the dream, this pearl symbolizes a good share that you will fall, either on the level of earning Money or meeting your life partner and marriage. Eating fish in a dream symbolizes...

title: Ibn Sirin and Al-Usaimi’s interpretations of seeing a pond in a dream
Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about the return of a traveler

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a traveler returning from his trip. It is a vision in which hearts rejoice and chests rejoice. Whoever does not want someone to return to him from the trip, this is the moment that everyone who has a traveler is waiting for, especially if he has a place close to his home. heart. It is a happy vision, but what the vision carries, and the signs that indicate it, so in this article we will explain in detail the vision of the traveler’s return.Interpretation of the dream of the traveler’s return by Ibn SirinInterpretation of the dream of the traveler’s returnThe vision is considered one of the dreams that carries many indications and signs, whether for the pioneer or the traveler, and the interpreters rely on it. The interpretation of this dream depends on the appearance, form and psychological state of the returning person.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');where the stability of the traveler's condition, well-being, happiness and comfort in his work and in the country to which he is traveling appears, but if the opposite is the case, he is in a bad condition and tired in the face. Exhausted, thin in body and wearing low-cut clothes, this indicates a lack of livelihood, suffering, problems and difficulties that this person is going through. The dream also carries some other signs, such as the arrival of news about that person, or the possibility of his return, as it indicates his escape from a predicament, and what has passed. He is in great distress. However, if there are disagreements and problems between the dreamer and the traveler, then the vision is a sign of the end of these problems between them and the return of relations. Some interpret the vision of the returning traveler as a sign of the cessation of anxiety, fatigue and sadness and the return of life as it was before, as it indicates the return of health and recovery to the dreamer if he sick.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Interpretation of the dream of a traveler returning by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a traveler returning from his trip carries many emotions felt by the viewer and his intense desire for change, such as the feeling of need To perform a duty or abandon a sin he commits and repent from it, such as it indicates his desire to develop and indicates his success in achieving his hopes and aspirations. The vision also indicates, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, the visionary’s escape from a crisis, problem, or serious harm that he was going through or had been. It will happen to him, as it indicates that the dreamer’s life will return to something. She was. Previously, whether it was good or bad. Ibn Sirin also explained that the vision shows the traveler’s condition, whether he is good and happy or bad and unhappy, according to his appearance and form in the vision, and often

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about water inside the house according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: The dream of water inside the house is one of the dreams that carry many different meanings based on the events of the dream itself in addition to the social status of the dreamer, and today, through one of the Egyptian websites, we will discuss the interpretation of this dream in detail for each of the unmarried women. Women and pregnant women. Interpretation of a dream about water inside the house by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about water in the house. Interpretation of a dream about water inside the house and running it on all floors indicates that sorrows and problems will dominate the lives of all family members. Running water entering the house and reaching all the rooms is evidence of an imminent disaster for the dreamer and will make him suffer. For a long time in his life, many problems arise for all family members. However, if the running water in the house is clean, this is evidence that the doors of livelihood and goodness will open before the dreamer, as he is able to achieve all his dreams, and God knows best.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' ' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');If the running water in the house is unclean, this is evidence of the presence of a disreputable woman trying to get close to a family member. It also indicates the entry of gossipers and hypocrites into the house. Home.Interpretation of a dream about water inside a house by Ibn Sirin. A dream about water inside a house is evidence that the dreamer’s life in the coming period will improve greatly, and he will also be freed from all worries and sorrows. As for someone who has suffered from despair in his life, the dream indicates that the nearness of God’s satisfaction entering the water A clean home indicates good offspring in addition to improving the dreamer’s condition in general. Ibn Sirin sees in a patient’s dream the interpreter of dreams of water inside the house, explaining that he will recover soon even if the illness is difficult. He is knowledgeable and helps all those in need.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');The entry of clean water into the house, as interpreted by Ibn Sirin, is a sign of the great discovery that will occur in the dreamer's life and that he will bring great profit. As for turbid water entering the merchant’s house, it indicates that he will fail in his trade, and thus he will lose a lot of money and drown in debt. Seeing clear and clean water entering the house means that a lot of good news will be heard that will make family members happy. The dream also symbolizes a change in circumstances. The dreamer, where worries and sorrows will be removed and the psychological state will be. They are much better than the previous times. Interpretation of Dreams Palm

title: Interpretation of almonds in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq: Eating almonds in a dream

preview.html: Dreaming of almonds means money, abundance of livelihood, and other interpretations that we will explain to an unmarried, married, pregnant, or divorced woman, or to a man, such as eating green almonds, or to those who saw that. Eating almonds, buying nuts, or roasted almond hearts, according to Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Jaafar Al-Sadiq, and others in: Interpretation of almonds in a dream Seeing almonds in a dream can be interpreted in different ways. Everyone who eats almonds in a dream has many benefits and meets a set of facilities in his life. Whoever sees almonds in a dream, it shows money, property, wealth and opportunities coming to him, and an indication of luck and fame that will address him if he appreciates these possibilities and finds happiness in the full sense of the word, and sometimes the vision shows an increase in value and respect for the people around you. Seeing pickled almonds in a dream indicates goodness. This dream is a sign of success in all areas and earning money and property, especially for women, it is a sign of good luck, close marriage, deliverance from problems, and happiness in everything. Sometimes this dream also shows promising news, beautiful conversations and ease in life. Seeing almonds in a dream If it is in its season, it expresses goodness, but if it is not in its season, it is a sign that the owner of the dream will face some problems. Seeing almonds in their season, beautiful and ripe in a dream, is an indication of good luck and people, while this dream shows the abundance and blessing that will be in the dreamer's actions and shows at the same time that there will be people in his environment who know the value of God and see the benefit and benefit from them. atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood.com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Seeing green almonds in a dream out of season shows happiness and joy, and at other times shows financial distress. As for the one who eats almonds out of season, it comes with the meaning of some events that occur in his life, some of which are good and positive events, and some of which are bad and negative events. This dream sometimes also indicates bad news or illness, but then all these bad situations will turn into good situations. Seeing almonds out of season means that he will face difficult days, will get into trouble, will be exposed to unnecessary work and will be exhausted for no reason. Eating almonds in a dream for the dreamer means that he will experience beautiful developments, because seeing eating almonds in The dream indicates finding goodness, happiness and health, and it also means the dreamer’s escape from the difficulties that appeared to him, and to obtaining permanent peace of mind, God willing. Interpretation of almonds in a dream by Ibn Sirin The scholar Muhammad bin Sirin said in the forty-third chapter of the book “The Great Interpretation of Dreams” that it is a vision. Almonds in a dream are not much different from seeing black beans
